p: The first studies on nasal administration of zidovudine to rats were performed using formulations constituted by an aqueous suspension of AZT (20 Âµmol/kg) or a suspension of AZT and probenecid [ 114]. Following nasal administration, AZT showed rapid absorption in the bloodstream and the CSF, even if the CSF/plasma ratio was lower than 1 and weakly increased in the presence of probenecid [ 114].
